title: Google\Cloud\Run\V2\ListServicesRequest
name: ListServicesRequest
description:
Request message for retrieving a list of Services.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.run.v2.ListServicesRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The location and project to list resources on. Location must be a valid GCP region, and may not be the "-" wildcard. Format: projects/{project}/locations/{location}

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: Maximum number of Services to return in this call.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: A page token received from a previous call to ListServices. All other parameters must match.

params.name: data.show_deleted
params.description: If true, returns deleted (but unexpired) resources along with active ones.
